summary: On their way to find Paris, Sture the dog (Hasse Alfredsson) and his friend Picasso end up on a hotel in the middle of nowhere. Along with Miss Mops, Sture tries to sniff out who is causing all the strange events of the hotel.
cast: Hans Alfredson|Margreth Weivers|Jan Mybrand|Tomas von Brömssen|Björn Kjellman|Rolf Skoglund|Johan Ulveson|Bo Christer Hjelte|Peter Harryson|Pernilla Wahlgren|Karin Gidfors|Stig Grybe|Johan Rabaeus|Steen Rasmussen|Michael Wikke
title: Hundhotellet
